variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line transfected with DNAJC5 wild-type and mutant constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: Mutant protein showed decreased localization and aggregation compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DNAJC5 construct was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Negative control not explicitly mentioned in the text, but could be assumed to be an untransfected HEK293 cell line.

Validation controls P/LP.Counts: 2 (one known pathogenic and one likely pathogenic variant)

Validation controls B/LB.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not applicable as this is a qualitative assay.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal protein localization and no aggregation.
Threshold for normal readout.Source: Assumed based on the nature of the assay

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Decreased localization, increased aggregation or both.
Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: Assumed based on the nature of the assay
